questions.text: When Diane said, "Everyone's eyes will be on my finger." How did Carla respond?
questions.correct: "Everyone's fingers will be down their throats."
questions.explanation:
"Everyone's fingers will be down their throats."

	Once again, Carla has insulted Diane about her looks. Carla is still not happy about the wedding.

questions.text: What was a koan according to Frasier?
questions.correct: A paradox one meditates on to become more enlightened
options: A paradox one meditates on to become more enlightened
questions.explanation:
A paradox one meditates on to become more enlightened.

	Diane said she made a little koan so Frasier explains to Sam what that means. He then says, "For example what was your face before your parents were born". Sam says "Easy a 10."

questions.text: Who called on the phone when Woody answered?
questions.explanation:
Cliff's mom.

	Cliff's mom was a regular guest on the show but in this episode she did not appear. Cliff had an unhealthy relationship with his mother.

questions.text: Who got tongue-tied talking to a beautiful woman?
questions.explanation:
Norm and Cliff.

	They ended up sounding like babbling idiots. Then they pick on each other about it.

questions.text: What was the name of the woman whose dog bit Cliff?
questions.explanation:
Madelyn Keith.

	Madelyn Keith was played by Anita Morris. Morris was born in 1943 in North Carolina. She died in 1994 from ovarian cancer.

questions.text: Why did Cliff say he lived with his mother?
questions.explanation:
They were related.

	Cliff was in his 30s and still lived at home, which the gang often picked on him about. He was very attached to his mother though he often tried to act like he wasn't.

questions.text: When Frasier said "The thing is fixed." how did Woody respond?
questions.explanation:
"Hulk Hogan can't have children?".

	Woody was often very slow and clueless. Woody was a great replacement for Coach because they were both the last to catch on to things at the bar.

questions.text: Why was the woman going out with Cliff?
options: they had a lot in common
questions.explanation:
to keep from being sued.

	She knew that if she was sued she would lose since Cliff could prove he was bitten by her dog. The gang thinks Cliff didn't know it, but Cliff informed him he did know but was not going to miss the chance to go out with a beautiful woman.

questions.text: What did Cliff say they were going to have?
questions.explanation:
"Ritz service at the room".

	Once again Cliff had become tongue-tied and mixed up his words. He meant to say "room service at the Ritz" but it came out backwards.

questions.text: Did Cliff end up sleeping with the woman whose dog bit him?
questions.explanation:
No.

	He ended up signing papers saying he wouldn't sue her. After that she made up an excuse and dumped him.
